title: Devil’s Political Marriage - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Mystery   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Aliens   Apocalypse   Average-looking Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Conflicting Loyalties   Cosmic Wars   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Enemies Become Lovers   Futuristic Setting   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Military   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Mystery Solving   Outer Space   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Schemes And Conspiracies   Smart Couple   Soldiers   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Time Travel   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars
author: Shao Xing ShiYi   绍兴十一
description:
Legend had it there was a demon of nightmares, the enemy of mankind, who desired to dominate the universe.

On the first day, he left the human fleet broken and in disorder.

The next day, he wanted to eliminate the Galactic Federation.

The third day he said–unless the soldier who had wounded him was married to him, he would destroy everything.

The leaders of the Galactic Federation discussed and decided to send the soldier Wu Xingyun to become the male-wife of the devil.

Wu Xingyun embarked on his mission…For the peace of the universe and the happiness of mankind.

“Soldier, are you confident to complete this mission?!”

“Yes Sir, will resolutely complete this task!”>
